title: Fix & refactor code snippet component
body:
# Bug Report


The code snippet's preview screen is crashing, we need this component to solve #15004 
Also it'd be good to split the code into different view and style files.

## Problem 
[comment]: # (A problem description)

When the preview screen is shown, it prints the following exception:

```
 Invariant Violation: View config getter callback for component `code` must be a function (received `undefined`). Make sure to start component names with a capital letter.

This error is located at:
    in code (created by SyntaxHighlighter)
    in pre (created by SyntaxHighlighter)
    in SyntaxHighlighter (created by quo2.components.code.snippet.snippet)
    in quo2.components.code.snippet.snippet (created by status_im2.contexts.quo_preview.code.snippet.cool_preview)
    in RCTView (at View.js:34)
    in View (created by status_im2.contexts.quo_preview.code.snippet.cool_preview)
    in RCTView (at View.js:34)
    in View (created by status_im2.contexts.quo_preview.code.snippet.cool_preview)
    in TouchableWithoutFeedback (created by status_im2.contexts.quo_preview.code.snippet.cool_preview)
    in status_im2.contexts.quo_preview.code.snippet.cool_preview (created by react_native.flat_list.flat_list)
    in RCTView (at View.js:34)
    in View (at VirtualizedList.js:980)
    in VirtualizedCellWrapper (at VirtualizedList.js:977)
    in RCTView (at View.js:34)
    in View (at ScrollView.js:1124)
    in RCTScrollView (at ScrollView.js:1260)
    in ScrollView (at ScrollView.js:1286)
    in ScrollView (at VirtualizedList.js:1329)
    in VirtualizedList (at FlatList.js:624)
    in FlatList (created by react_native.flat_list.flat_list)
    in react_native.flat_list.flat_list (created by status_im2.contexts.quo_preview.code.snippet.preview_code_snippet)
    in RCTView (at View.js:34)
    in View (created by status_im2.contexts.quo_preview.code.snippet.preview_code_snippet)
    in status_im2.contexts.quo_preview.code.snippet.preview_code_snippet (created by reagent181)
    in RCTView (at View.js:34)
    in View (created by reagent181)
    in reagent181 (created by Context.Consumer)
    in react_native.safe_area.consumer (created by reagent160)
    in RNCSafeAreaProvider (at SafeAreaContext.tsx:50)
    in SafeAreaProvider (created by reagent160)
    in reagent160 (at gestureHandlerRootHOC.tsx:13)
    in RNGestureHandlerRootView (at GestureHandlerRootView.android.tsx:23)
    in GestureHandlerRootView (at gestureHandlerRootHOC.tsx:12)
    in gestureHandlerRootHOC(reagent160) (created by WrappedComponent)
    in WrappedComponent (at renderApplication.js:45)
    in RCTView (at View.js:34)
    in View (at AppContainer.js:106)
    in RCTView (at View.js:34)
    in View (at AppContainer.js:132)
    in AppContainer (at renderApplication.js:39), js engine: hermes

```


#### Expected behavior

Show the component as [designs](https://www.figma.com/file/WQZcp6S0EnzxdTL4taoKDv/Design-System-for-Mobile?node-id=5626-159428&t=avnAO7hTidrTl6KV-4)

#### Actual behavior

Screen crashes

### Reproduction

1) Open Status
2) Navigate to Quo2.0 Preview
3) Code -> Snippet

### Additional Information

- Operating System: Android, iOS
